event.title: is believed that Baja California had human presence for thousands of years

data.event: It is believed that Baja California had human presence for thousands of years, however the available evidence indicates an occupation approximate from 8000 BCE.

event.title: were developed in the last thousand years

data.event: The sited mentioned sites are more recent, it is estimated that they were developed in the last thousand years, though the engravings, more resistant to erosion, could be older.
